_sText:
Counter-Strike: Source : Bot's Navigation Mesh for the map DE_BANQIAO_R2

Nav Creator: Meurglis3, Release Date: November 19 2013

Here is the Navigation Mesh for good urban themed map de_banqiao_r2 by CXX AL (released August 2011).

It's a created from scratch and fully hand-tuned .nav-file (because in original author's release the .nav-file wasn't submitted).

Some paths were constructed from scratch completely (all three ladders, indoor areas on second floor in the house, way over the house extension) because auto-gen doesn't perceive them as walkable areas.

Well... now bots won't begin to joke more with you! :D

Also this Navigation Mesh is fully Place Painted.

Credits and Gratitudes:

CXX AL (for high detailed urban-themed map).

Additional Gratitudes:

BarnDoor (for perfect playable navigation meshes for many fine CS:S maps),

Chizbone (for informative and clever article BOT_BRAINED and a set of excellent navigation meshes),

CoCoNUT (for fine hand-tuned navigation meshes for many fine CS:S maps),

Valve Developer Community (for learning articles by Navigation Meshes and Navigation Mesh Commands).

Play and Enjoy! Always will be grateful for your remarks and feedbacks.

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

UPDATED 15.11.2014

General Fixes:
- Added Place Names;
- Some other minor changes.

PLEASE REDOWNLOAD UPDATED ARCHIVE!
